Darekuur, the so-called "Slaughterer of Mad Laughter," was the leader of the bandits. He was as cruel as his nickname was ridiculous—until I cut his head off a few years ago.

Unfortunately, Thulsa re-attached the head and brought Darekuur back with his necromancy.

How'd you like to prove your bravery to me? Cutting Darekuur's head off won't be too difficult, and "Darekuur the Twice-Beheaded" isn't nearly as scary.

Huh. Ugly, ain't he?

I'm glad he's dead. I can still hear his creepy, chilling laughter in my ears.

Now you and I have something in common—we've both cut Darekuur's head off!

You can find Darekuur south of this Isolated Hunter's Camp.

Bring me his head, will you? I want to see how much his brains have rotted since last time.
